name: Leap Frog 2k18
description:
Tap the Frog guys!
Enjoy classic leap frog Curvy Road Race. Cross Road Frog Game is all about a hungry frog who is after his cricket meal which is on the other side of the street! Help Frog cross the highway's and make sure leap frog survives it in one piece! Its not that simple, Get ready for exciting fun challenge. With the large cars and busses all over it won't be easy.

Dear Frog,
Get ready for adventure. I'm telling you!!

Features
• Un-blockable vehicles!!
• Single Player & Multiplayer Coming Soon
• Random generated levels
• Brown, Pink & Black Environments
• Turn on/off music and sound effects
• Frog jumps across the road and traffic
• Great visuals and froggy sound

How To Play
• Use arrows or swipe left/right/up & down to move Frog
• Cross road by jumping
• Avoid buses and cars

~~~ So what are you waiting for? Start your Cross Road Journey and download game for your phone or tablet! We would love to hear from you. Please email suggestions at feedback@invoguesol.com
